message.content:
1. Time to first rescue analgesics administration was longer in certain groups.
2. The difference in time to first rescue analgesics administration in these groups was statistically significant (P < 0.05).

messages.content:
Statement: Also, time to first rescue analgesics administration was longer in the same groups (P < 0.05).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
